text: Anɨb agɨl bɨne okok kɨlop agak, Nɨbi olap bogɨlak sek mɨdɨl, kɨsɨlɨm nab awl ayaŋ kal nop ak amɨl agɨnɨgab, Bogɨlak. Bɨyad nɨgep tek olap pal okok nɨb apɨl amnin agɨl, kal yɨp ak apjakek, tap nop ñen ñɨŋɨnɨmuŋ ak ma mɨdeb agɨnɨgab agak. Ma yek nɨm, nep yɨl apebin agɨnɨgab agak. Yɨp bilet omɨŋal nokom ñan agɨnɨgab agak.
